description: This newly renovated apartment boasts all the comforts of home and can accommodate up to Four people.  Included in your stay is wireless internet, TV, clean linens/towels, fully equipped kitchen, comfortable furnishings and free parking on the street. No parking restrictions 24/7.
name: Nice 1 Bedroom Apt.
review: The place is quiet and comfortable. Parking available within a block or two. Host is nice and responsive. Great location for ppl needing to be close to queens, and for $80 a night for up to 4, it's an incredible value. Was perfect for my daughter and I.
